channel.title: Realy need help at commands

item.title: Realy need help at commands
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Mental Piracy:

why not just change the command to ::rights (playerid) (rightLevel). That way you condense 4-5 commands into one. Then just have the rightLevel be the p.playerRights

yeah i have something like that except that it didn’t work with 2 spaces because “command.split” didn’t work with a player name. so i had 1 of two choices: making the split 2 spaces or just making an interface (which i did because having two spaces seems inprofessional)

[quote=“Eson, post:5, topic:332132”]Where do you add commands in?[quote author=halflive9 link=topic=428571.msg3146804#msg3146804 date=1268154780]
thanks you realy helped me.
[/quote]
where do you add commands in?[/quote]

lmfao you’re kidding right?

private void customCommand(String command) {

use the search button…

item.title: Realy need help at commands
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

wow, givemod and giveowner are exactly like giveadmin… and for demote, it’s the same too but you just add a 0 at the player rights.

 if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3)
                {
                        try
                        {
                                String otherPName = command.substring(7);
                                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
                                if (otherPIndex != -1)
                                {
                                        client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                                        p.playerRights = 1;
                                        p.sM(""+ playerName + " has made you aan Admin!");
                                        sM("You have made " + p.playerName + " an Admin!");
                                        p.disconnected = true;
                                        p.logoutButton = true;
                                }
                                else
                                {
                                        sM("The name doesnt exist.");
                                }
                        }
                        catch (Exception e)
                        {
                                sM("Try entering a name you want to promote..");
                        }
                }
 if (command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerRights >= 3)
                {
                        try
                        {
                                String otherPName = command.substring(10);
                                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
                                if (otherPIndex != -1)
                                {
                                        client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                                        p.playerRights = 3;
                                        p.sM(""+ playerName + " has made you aan Admin!");
                                        sM("You have made " + p.playerName + " an Admin!");
                                        p.disconnected = true;
                                        p.logoutButton = true;
                                }
                                else
                                {
                                        sM("The name doesnt exist.");
                                }
                        }
                        catch (Exception e)
                        {
                                sM("Try entering a name you want to promote..");
                        }
                }
 if (command.startsWith("demote") && playerRights >= 3)
                {
                        try
                        {
                                String otherPName = command.substring(7);
                                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
                                if (otherPIndex != -1)
                                {
                                        client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                                        p.playerRights = 1;
                                        p.sM(""+ playerName + " has demoted you!");
                                        sM("You have made demote "+playerName+"");
                                        p.disconnected = true;
                                        p.logoutButton = true;
                                }
                                else
                                {
                                        sM("The name doesnt exist.");
                                }
                        }
                        catch (Exception e)
                        {
                                sM("Try entering a name you want to promote..");
                        }
                }

Read full topic

item.title: Realy need help at commands
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

ok so i wanna get ::demote , ::givemod and ::giveowner i got already ::giveadmin code is here --> if (command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerRights >= 3) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.playerRights = 2; p.sM(playerName + " has made you aan Admin!"); sM("You have made " + p.playerName + " an Admin!"); p.disconnected = true; p.logoutButton = true; } else { sM("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to promote.."); } } can someone give me the codes for the other commands thanks, i tried to figure this out but didn’t find it.

Read full topic
